summary: This mod adds several nordic towers as watchtowers along the Sea of Ghosts coast from Solitude to the East of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome to

[img]http://s18.postimage.org/xs8hqf4k9/900copertina.jpg[/img]
[/center]

* OVERVIEW *

This mod adds several nordic towers as watchtowers along the Sea of Ghosts coast from Solitude to the East of Skyrim.
Every watchtower have a random loot chest.

[center][img]http://s12.postimage.org/izqq4xpkd/900_Screen_Shot183.jpg[/img][/center]

* INSTALL *

Unpack and place ESP in data folder. Activate the mod via menu launcher.

* UNINSTALL *
Delete files.
author: MannyGT
